title: Walking Back: A Story From The World of The Dark Roads!
description: Walk with a man who's been through hell and stumbled back into the world with a passenger laying across his shoulders. Let him remember what it was like, what the world once was, before his injuries became so great that his mind lay in tatters behind a broken face. Travel with him as he speaks to the voices of long dead friends and to the one who chose to tour hell with him. Find Richie as he walks back through a time before the events of The Dark Roads.
author: Wayne Lemmons
